channel.title: Computer Vision on
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Vision on

item.title: Multimodal LLMs - Understanding Images and Text Together
item.description: Text-only LLMs miss half the world. Images, diagrams, charts, photos. Multimodal models see and read - understanding both modalities together.

item.title: 2D Convolutions - How Neural Networks See Images
item.description: Images are grids of pixels. Fully connected layers would need billions of parameters.
